EPPO Code: 1. You must enter either an EPPO code or genus (preferably with species, and optionally with variety)
2. You must fill in all fields marked MANDATORY
3. Choose a value from the specified lists where appropriate
4. Do not use extra commas as this will create errors when you try to upload the file
5. When you've finished, make sure you delete the example data and these guidance notes
6. Save this file as a .CSV and upload it
